sentence.Network_en: Istanbul lies between the Sea and Sea of Marmara of Bosporus and Golden Horn Bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊斯坦布尔位于黑海和马尔马拉海之间,博斯普鲁斯海峡及金角湾横贯其中.

sentence.Network_en: This is the railway that comes up from Arabia to the Sea of Marmara opposite Istanbul.
sentence.Network_cn: 这段铁路是从阿拉伯半岛到伊斯坦布尔对面的马尔马拉海的.
